Rodimus:

"We're facing Unicron's menace once more, now in past"said Rodimu=
s"That made us to do a forced alliance with Predacons... but Unicron has be=
en pretty quiet lately... and I don't like it"
  ----- Original Message ---=
-- 
  From: Dark Mouse 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, Ma=
rch 30, 2005 12:16 AM
  Subject: Re: Silence



  Silence::

  She smiled b=
ack at him, but spoke matter of factly, "I have lost some
  of the data in =
my memory core. Too many factors to dictate which exact
  one it could be. =
But of this I am certain, my recon and combat skills
  are intact."  She lo=
wered her head as a momentaty recognition of a
  lost piece of data crossed=
 her mental circuits. "Oh, perhaps retrieval
  would not be an ill-advised =
solution. I may be able to have my records
  restored."  An image flashed t=
hrough her  mind faster than she could
  comprihend it. But a tear fell fro=
m her cheek, though she did n[t feel
  the emotion, it fell from a long dis=
tant reaction.  She looked at the
  drop of water that fell to her hand. "O=
dd, perhaps I am in need of
  repair.  I am leaking from my optics." Her to=
ne of voice showed no
  emotion, perfectly monotone. "So, I was sent to hel=
p the Maximals. BUt
  so far, my mission orders are lost. Perhaps you will =
inform me of what
  our current situation is?"
